name: Color Link (itch)
description:
ChangeLog

  • Prototype_0.0 - First Build - 26/09/2015

First build of the game.

  • Prototype_0.1 - Menu Update - 27/09/2015

Added simple menu, with different difficulties.

BUG_1 : Balls don't fall on restart after Game Over if going to menu first.

  • Prototype_0.1.1 - 27/09/2015

Resolved restart bug : BUG_1.
